instruction.value: Instill into conjuctiva of LEFT eye beginning 24 hours prior to surgery.
Instill into conjuctiva of RIGHT eye beginning 24 hours prior to surgery.
Instill into conjuctiva of AFFECTED eye beginning 24 hours prior to surgery.
Instill into conjuctiva of LEFT eye.
Instill into conjuctiva of RIGHT eye.
Instill into conjuctiva of AFFECTED eye.
